resources.string: ‚Äú Your mental health is just as important as your physical health. ‚Äù
‚Äú Taking care of your mental health is an act of self-love. ‚Äù
This information is for track your activity.

"
 üß≥ Welcome to Places Activity!
 
 ‚Ä¢ It shows all tourist places in Bangladesh.
 ‚Ä¢ It offers ten different options to explore.
 ‚Ä¢ By tapping any item, it will open in Google Maps, providing location details.
 
 ‚ö†Ô∏è Please note:
 An internet connection is required to receive responses.
 
 Enjoy exploring!
 "

"
 üí¨ Welcome to Chat Space, powered by Gemini.
 
 ‚Ä¢ This is a temporary chat session.
 ‚Ä¢ After leaving this activity, your messages will be lost.
 ‚Ä¢ Messages are not saved in the app's database or locally.
 
 ‚ö†Ô∏è Please note:
 An internet connection is required to receive responses.
 "

"
 üåç Welcome to Social Space!
 
 ‚Ä¢ All posts are visible to every user of this app.
 ‚Ä¢ Your active status is public.
 ‚Ä¢ Tap on profile pictures to see who is online.
 
 ‚ö†Ô∏è Please note:
 ‚Ä¢ An internet connection is required to post.
 ‚Ä¢ Avoid sharing sensitive information like credit card details or API keys.
 
 Enjoy connecting with others!
 "

"
 ‚òÅÔ∏è Welcome to Weather Updates.
 
 ‚Ä¢ Get weather updates every three hours for the next 5 days.
 ‚Ä¢ Receive suggestions based on the current weather conditions.
 
 ‚ö†Ô∏è Please note:
 ‚Ä¢ An internet connection is required to receive updates.
 
 Stay Healthy!
 "

"
 ü§† Welcome to My Activity.
 
 ‚Ä¢ Track your daily activities and moods.
 ‚Ä¢ Each day, the app will ask how you‚Äôre feeling and record your mood.
 
 üìù Please note:
 ‚Ä¢ You can view your activity history even when offline.
 
 Stay connected with your emotions and activities!
 "

"
 üì§ Welcome to My Post!
 
 ‚Ä¢ It shows all the post you have made in Social Space.
 ‚Ä¢ Long press/tap on empty space to update/delete your post.
 
 ‚ö†Ô∏è Please note:
 ‚Ä¢ An internet connection is required to update/delete.
 ‚Ä¢ You can view your post even when offline.
 
 Enjoy connecting with others!
 "

"
 ‚öïÔ∏è Welcome to Personal Space,
 
 ‚Ä¢ Record your voice and submit it for analysis.
 ‚Ä¢ Your voice will be transcribed to text and then analyzed.
 ‚Ä¢ Long press to select a voice for analysis or deletion.
 ‚Ä¢ To save a voice, you must add a name to it.
 
 ‚ö†Ô∏è Please note:
 ‚Ä¢ An internet connection is required to record a voice.
 ‚Ä¢ You can listen to the saved voice without an internet connection.
 ‚Ä¢ Your recordings are saved only on your device. Uninstalling the app or clearing data will delete them.
 ‚Ä¢ For privacy reasons, we do not store your voices in our database.
 ‚Ä¢ Chat Space cannot open without an internet connection.
 
 Enjoy recording and analyzing your emotions!
 Try Chat Space and Stay Refreshed.
 "
